title: Technical SEO - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Christopher Long March 16, 2021 LiveBlogPosting Schema: A Powerful Tool for Top Stories Success Technical SEO | Search Engines | Marketing Industry When the team at Go Fish Digital began helping a large media company break into Google’s Top Stories for major single-day events, they discovered that one way many sites do this is through the use of a schema type called LiveBlogPosting. Here are there findings regarding what this structured data type is, how sites are using it, and what impact it might have on Top Stories visibility. Read this post By: Morgan McMurray March 9, 2021 According to the Experts: 5 Technical SEO Trends to Watch in 2021 Technical SEO | Marketing Industry To find out more about the state of technical SEO in 2021, we asked seven industry experts for their thoughts and advice. Read this post By: Crystal Carter February 23, 2021 The Strategic Value of Structured Data Implementation on SME Websites Technical SEO | On-page SEO | Advanced SEO When we think about how small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) can compete in today's ever-evolving SERP landscape, time and time again, well-implemented structured data is what makes the difference. Read this post By: AbdulGaniy Shehu February 22, 2021 7 Emerging Technologies in SEO and Their Applications SEO Tools | Technical SEO As an SEO professional, you need to know the latest industry trends to keep up with its ever-changing demands. In this post, you’ll find seven emerging technologies in the SEO industry, and how they impact your work as an SEO expert. Read this post By: Carly Schoonhoven February 12, 2021 Impactful SEO Audits for B2B Whiteboard Friday | Technical SEO | Competitive Research A comprehensive audit of your B2B website can mean the difference between winning new clients and losing them to the competition. In this brand new episode of Whiteboard Friday, guest host Carly Schoonhoven walks you through four areas that can take your audits to the next level. Read this post By: Pierce Brelinsky February 9, 2021 The Definitive Guide to JavaScript SEO (2021 Edition) Technical SEO | Advanced SEO The web is in a golden age of front-end development. JavaScript and technical search engine optimization are experiencing a renaissance. In this article, Pierce Brelinsky of Go Fish Digital shows you how to optimize your JS-powered website for search in 2021. Read this post By: Kavi Kardos February 2, 2021 Announcing the New Technical SEO Certification Series: What It Is & How to Get Certified Technical SEO | Moz News The Moz Learning Team has put in many, many hours of work to develop a technically focused, in-depth training series that hones in on the nuts and bolts of technical SEO. We’re thrilled to announce the launch of the Technical SEO Certification Series through Moz Academy. Read this post By: Lydia German January 27, 2021 How We Increased Our Client’s Leads by 751% on Less Than £1K Per Month [Case Study] Advanced SEO | Technical SEO | On-page SEO The team at Tao Digital Marketing breaks down how they were able to go above and beyond for their client, Fleetcover, using four strategies that increased leads by 751%, keywords by 259%, and impressions by 535% — all with a small SEO budget. Read this post By: Roy Hinkis January 21, 2021 4 SEO Strategies for Programmatic Sites Advanced SEO | Technical SEO Planning and executing SEO strategies for sites with hundreds of millions of pages is no easy task, but there are strategies to make it simpler. Roy explores the four major SEO challenges you'll encounter when dealing with programmatic pages, and unpacks how to overcome them. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers October 26, 2020 HTTPS Is Table Stakes for SEO in 2020 Search Engines | Technical SEO Page-one HTTPS URLs in Google search are at 98% (according to MozCast). This post looks at a much larger data set (7.5M keywords) and finds much the same. If you haven't switched to HTTPS/SSL, you can't play the Google game. Read this post By: Britney Muller September 25, 2020 Accessible Machine Learning for SEOs — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Technical SEO | AI and SEO Machine learning might seem far outside the scope of your SEO work. MozCon speaker Britney Muller is back with a special edition of Whiteboard Friday to tell you why that's not true, and to go through a few steps to get you started. Read this post By: Robin Lord August 5, 2020 How to Make a Scalable SMS Chatbot Using Twilio, Python, and Google Sheets (with Free Code) SEO Tools | Technical SEO | Advanced SEO Many of us are helping businesses that are facing hard times, or we’re facing hard times ourselves. The use of SMS chatbots could be a way for you to look outside your normal list of solutions. In this post, Robin gives you instructions and code to produce not just one, but a series of text-based chatbots that can be managed by Google Sheets. Read this post By: Cyrus Shepard July 17, 2020 Core Web Vitals: The Next Official Google Ranking Factor - Whiteboard Friday Technical SEO | Whiteboard Friday | Advanced SEO There's a new ranking factor in town: Core Web Vitals. Expected in 2021, this Google-announced algorithm change has a few details you should be aware of. Cyrus Shepard dives in this week on Whiteboard Friday. Read this post By: Britney Muller July 3, 2020 Page Speed Optimization: Metrics, Tools, and How to Improve — Best of Whiteboard Friday Technical SEO | Whiteboard Friday Page speed has always been a crucial part of SEO work, and as more companies make the shift to online operations, optimization becomes more important than ever. However, it's a complex subject that tends to be very technical. What are the most crucial things to understand about your site's page speed, and how can you begin to improve? To help you answer these questions, we're sharing this popular episode of Whiteboard Friday where Britney Muller goes over what you need to know to get started. Read this post
